'''1.21.21''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on August 14, 2024 for all platforms except Windows and Nintendo Switch, August 15, 2024 for Windows, and August 20, 2024 for Nintendo Switch<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/29279683879949-Minecraft-1-21-21-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.21 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 14, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs and improves reliability of connecting to Realms.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.21 Hotfix
|;From released versions before v1.21.0
|93646|When using a dispenser with glowstone in it at a player, it will add the glowstone to the player's helmet inventory slot.
|151620|Freezing/drowning effect does not stop when exiting powder snow/water by sleeping in a bed if the powder snow/water is one block above the ground.
|176316|Riding horses, donkeys, or mules teleports the player.
|;old
|185246|Realms, Marketplace and other services inaccessible.
'''Others'''
*Improved reliability of connecting to Realms.
}}
